conversations.english: Hi, Jenny. Are you going to school now?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，珍妮，你现在要去上学吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yup. I have English at 9 in the morning.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊！我早上9点有英文课。

conversations.english: Mr.Martin, we're on arrival.
conversations.chinese: 马丁先生，我们到了。
conversations.reply_english: It's nice of you to see my off at the airport. Thank you very much.
conversations.reply_chinese: 您真是太周到了，非常感谢您来机场送我。

conversations.english: Steven, have you any friend in London?
conversations.chinese: 史蒂文，你在伦敦有朋友吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, my old friend Hanson lives there
conversations.reply_chinese: 有啊，我的老朋友汉森就住在伦敦。

conversations.english: Steven, shall we go shopping tomorrow?
conversations.chinese: 史蒂文，我们明天去购物好吗？
conversations.reply_english: Hum...Why not go shopping the day after tomorrow? Tomorrow is Saturday. I hate all the hustle and bustle of Saturday shopping.
conversations.reply_chinese: 嗯……为何后天不去呢？明天可是周六，我讨厌星期六买东西那么挤来挤去的。

conversations.english: How come you're still up? Shouldn't you be asleep by now?
conversations.chinese: 你怎么还醒着?难道昨晚到现在你都没合眼吗?
conversations.reply_english: I've been having a hard time sleeping lately.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我最近一直很难入睡

conversations.english: Some people pile on their agonise and try to seek other’s sympathy by telling them how miserable they are.
conversations.chinese: 有些人过分渲染自己的痛苦，告诉别人自己过得多么凄惨以博取同情。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. They take the advantage of other people's hospitality and generosity.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。他们利用人们的热心和慷慨。

conversations.english: Pardon me. Could you please pass me the tissue?
conversations.chinese: 对不起,请把纸巾传给我好吗?
conversations.reply_english: Sure, here you are.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的,给你。

conversations.english: Matthew, do you know much about body language in countries around the world?
conversations.chinese: 马修，你了解世界各国的肢体语言吗？
conversations.reply_english: Sure, I've picked up a few things from travelling around for work. Why?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然。我工作中有很多出差的机会，了解到一些这方面的知识。怎么了？

conversations.english: Hi! Susan! I haven't seen you for ages!
conversations.chinese: 嗨！苏珊！好久没见到你了！
conversations.reply_english: I've been really busy. How is everything?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我一直都很忙。你都好吗？

conversations.english: Hey, what're you doing here?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，你怎么在这儿啊？
conversations.reply_english: Why? It's my room.
conversations.reply_chinese: 什么意思？这是我房间啊．

conversations.english: Can I use your laptop for a while?
conversations.chinese: 能用一下你的笔记本电脑吗?
conversations.reply_english: Sure, go ahead.
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然,用吧.

conversations.english: What are you doing there with your mobile phone?
conversations.chinese: 你在那用手机玩什么呢?
conversations.reply_english: I'm moblogging!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在写移动博客!

title: 我电脑里的数据都丢了

conversations.english: What's wrong with you? Why do you look so sad?
conversations.chinese: 你怎么了,看起来很伤心的样子?
conversations.reply_english: I've lost all my files from the computer. It's a total disaster.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我电脑里所有的数据都丢了.这简直是个灾难.

conversations.english: Not a single email until now? it's already twelve o'clock. I can't believe it!
conversations.chinese: 还没有人给我发邮件?已经过了12点了,真是难以置信!
conversations.reply_english: Can't bear it, right? I've been there before. I'll feel uncomfortable if no one calls me or sends me text messages, like there is something missing.
conversations.reply_chinese: 受不了了,是吧?我也遇到过这种情况.如果没有人给我打电话,发短信,我会觉得不舒服,跟少了点什么的.

conversations.english: Please help yourself to whatever you like, don't be shy.
conversations.chinese: 喜欢什么就吃什么，别拘束。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, thank you. I’ve already been helping myself.
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，谢谢。我不会客气的。

conversations.english: Terrible. How about people's lives?
conversations.chinese: 太可怕了。人们的生命怎么样？
conversations.reply_english: Fortunately, there is no person died.
conversations.reply_chinese: 幸运的是没有人死亡。

conversations.english: Did you read the news that 'China's property prices rose at the fastest pace in 18 months in December, ending the year with rising fears of bubbles in the property market'?
conversations.chinese: 你读那条新闻了吗，新闻说中国12月份房价的增长率是过去的18个月最高的,引起了对房地产泡沫市场的恐慌。
conversations.reply_english: No. Does the newspaper say what has caused that?
conversations.reply_chinese: 没看。报纸说什么导致房价这么快上涨了吗？

conversations.english: Hello, Daisy, how are you doing?
conversations.chinese: 黛西，你好，最近还好吧？
conversations.reply_english: Fine, thank you. I haven’ t seen you for quite some time. What have you been up to recently?
conversations.reply_chinese: 挺好的，谢谢．我好长时间都没见你了’在忙什么呢？

conversations.english: Today people are hearing about information superhighways and the intemet.
conversations.chinese: 现会人们不断听人谈论信息高速公路和互联网。
conversations.reply_english: Is this change going to be beneficial for theindividuals like you and me.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这种变化对于你，我这样的个人来说有什么裨益？

conversations.english: I usually get a lot of information on the computer and use E-mail to send messages to my friends.
conversations.chinese: 我经常在计算机上获取很多信息，用电子邮件发信息给我的朋友。
conversations.reply_english: Me too.Recently,I'm fascinated with net-chat.I've made many friends on the net.Every day I talk to them and share many interesting things with them.I really enjoy it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我也是。最近，我迷上了网聊。我在网上交了很多朋友。每天我都和他们聊天，和他们分享有趣的事情。我很喜欢这样。

conversations.english: How can you keep in touch with your aunt in America?
conversations.chinese: 你如何与你在美国的阿姨保持联系？
conversations.reply_english: Oh,I make a phone call once a month.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，我每个月打一次电话。

conversations.english: Hello, Jason, there is going to be a screening of Final Destination 3 at our campus cinema tomorrow. I plan to go to see it.
conversations.chinese: 杰森,你好,我听说明天晚上学校电影院放映"死神来了3",我想去看.
conversations.reply_english: Is it a horror movie?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这是恐怖电影吗?

conversations.english: How do you think they could be ended?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得怎么样才能让他们停下来？
conversations.reply_english: I don't think that there is any easy way. The United Nations could send peacekeepers into the country. At least then the warring parties could be forced to negotiate.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我不认为有什么简单的法子就能让他们停下来。联合国派驻了维和部队到这些国家，至少能让战斗的双方被迫停下来和谈。

title: 圆滑世故 All things to all men

conversations.english: Maybe we all will be all things to all men.
conversations.chinese: 也许有一天我都要变得世故圆滑。
conversations.reply_english: How terrible!
conversations.reply_chinese: 真可怕！

conversations.english: I'm thirsty. Pull over to that store, I'll buy some drinks.
conversations.chinese: 我渴了，停到那家商店门前吧，我要买些喝的。
conversations.reply_english: I'm afraid I can't. Parking is not allowed here.
conversations.reply_chinese: 恐怕不行，这儿不让停车。

conversations.english: How are you feeling, John?
conversations.chinese: 约翰，你感觉如何？
conversations.reply_english: Oh, not too bad, but I've got to stay in bed.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还不太糟糕，但是得躺在床上。

title: 言过其实 All his geese are swans

conversations.english: He always likes to say something as if all his geese are swans.
conversations.chinese: 他谈论问题时，总喜欢言过其词。
conversations.reply_english: I know this characteristic of him. So I never think seriously of his words.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道他的这个特点。所以，对于他的话，我从来就没有认真对待过。

title: 咱们得找个避雨的地方

conversations.english: It's raining heavily.
conversations.chinese: 雨下得真大。
conversations.reply_english: We have to find a shelter.
conversations.reply_chinese: 咱们得找个避雨的地方。

title: 喝酒是感情交流的介质

conversations.english: Bob! Your eyes look bloodshot. Did you not sleep well?
conversations.chinese: 鲍勃!你满眼血丝,没睡好?
conversations.reply_english: I had a drop too much last night. I attended a banquet given by a Chinese colleague of mine. And it was startling for me to find that people are forced to drink against their will on a Chinese table.
conversations.reply_chinese: 昨晚参加一个中国同事的聚会,多喝了几倍.中国人喝起酒来真可怕,人们老是被逼着多喝几杯.

conversations.english: Look, it's all water over the dam now. Let's leave it behind us.
conversations.chinese: 看，一切都无法挽回，就别再多想了。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I know, but it's too hard to do.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，我知道，但是很难做到。

conversations.english: How is grandpa doing recently?
conversations.chinese: 最近爷爷身体如何？
conversations.reply_english: Not good. The doctor told him not to smoke again, but it just rolls off him like water off the duck’s back!
conversations.reply_chinese: 不是很好，医生叫他不要再抽烟了，但是他把它看做耳边风，一点儿用都没有。

conversations.english: Could you give me some advice on how to bring up my son properly?
conversations.chinese: 您能给我些建议如何才能教子有方呢？
conversations.reply_english: He's a bright boy, isn't he?
conversations.reply_chinese: 他不是很聪明吗？

conversations.english: The poor girl is up to the eyes in study all the day.
conversations.chinese: 这个可怜的女孩整天忙着学习。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, she has a lot of homework.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，她有很多功课要做。

conversations.english: I met Mark yesterday. He looked blue.
conversations.chinese: 我昨天遇到马克，他看起来很忧郁。
conversations.reply_english: He’s been on the gravy train these years, hasn’t he?
conversations.reply_chinese: 这几年他一直在做很挣钱的工作呀，不是吗？

conversations.english: I'll always remember my college days.
conversations.chinese: 我会永远记住我的大学生活的.
conversations.reply_english: Oh yeah?
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么呢?

title: 我为男主角感到有点遗憾

conversations.english: The acting of this film is marvelous in spite of the thin plot.
conversations.chinese: 电影的演技好极了，除了情节空泛一点。
conversations.reply_english: I'm sorry for hero.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我为男主角感到有点遗憾。

conversations.english: What kinds of meat are most popular in your country?
conversations.chinese: 在你们国家人们最常吃哪几种肉？
conversations.reply_english: We usually eat chicken, pork and beef. You eat these meats a lot in your country too, don't you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们通常吃鸡肉、猪肉和牛肉。在你们国家你们也大多吃这些肉，不是吗？

title: 派对之夜需要什么样的饮料

conversations.english: Tonight is a party night! What drinks do you think we need?
conversations.chinese: 今晚是派对之夜！你认为我们需要什么样的饮料？
conversations.reply_english: Well, not everyone wants to drink beer. Make sure there are some soft drinks and juice. Nothing's as refreshing as iced drinks on a hot day.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不是每个人都想喝啤酒的。准备些软饮料和果汁吧。在大热天没有什么能够像冰饮料那样让人神清气爽。

conversations.english: Happy Birthday,Alice.Many happy returns of the day.Here's a present for you.
conversations.chinese: 爱丽丝，生日快乐。年年有今日，岁岁有今朝。这是送给你的礼物。
conversations.reply_english: Thank you,Peter.Come into the dining room.I'm going to cut the cake soon.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你，彼得。请到饭厅坐。我很快就要切蛋糕了。

conversations.english: Good evening. I've come to see Miss Morrison
conversations.chinese: 晚上好，我来找莫立生小姐
conversations.reply_english: Oh! Good evening. I'm sorry, but she is not in. She's gone out to the theatre
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦 晚上好。很抱歉她不在。她去剧院了。

title: 享受旅行 Enjoying the trip

conversations.english: We're lucky today.
conversations.chinese: 我们今天真幸运。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, there aren't any clouds in the sky and we've got such a beautiful view here. Look! This is St James Park. And there's Buckingham Palace
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，天上没几朵云彩，而且我们还在这看到了这么美的景色。 看这是圣詹姆斯公园，那是白金汉宫

title: 你的假期什么时候开始

conversations.english: When is your vacation going to start?
conversations.chinese: 你的假期什么时候开始？
conversations.reply_english: I'll be leaving on the fifth of August for the vacation
conversations.reply_chinese: 我八月五日动身去度假。

conversations.english: Are you feeling better today, Bill?
conversations.chinese: 比尔，你今天觉得好些了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Well, it’s hard to say. I coughed a lot in the evening.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，很难说。我晚上咳得很厉害。

conversations.english: Oh you look awful! What’s the matter?
conversations.chinese: 啊呀，你的气色看上去很差，怎么了？
conversations.reply_english: Oh! I feel really under the weather. I’ve got a sore throat and a bad cough.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦！我感觉实在很糟。我的喉咙肿痛，咳嗽得也很厉害。

conversations.english: So John, have you ever been to China before?
conversations.chinese: John 你以前来过中国吗？
conversations.reply_english: No, I haven’t. This is the first time I have been to China.
conversations.reply_chinese: 从来没有，这是第一次。

conversations.english: What happened to you yesterday?
conversations.chinese: 你昨天怎么啦？
conversations.reply_english: Oh I fell over on the way to work.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，我在上班路上摔了一跤。

conversations.english: I am exhausted. I need some sleep.
conversations.chinese: 我累死了，太缺乏睡眠了。
conversations.reply_english: Didn’t you sleep well last night?
conversations.reply_chinese: 昨晚没睡好？

conversations.english: Where are you going this weekend?
conversations.chinese: 这个周末你打算去哪儿？
conversations.reply_english: I’m going to Hainan.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我会去海南。

title: 和你做邻居也再好不过了

conversations.english: Matthew? Hi!
conversations.chinese: 马修?嗨!
conversations.reply_english: Steve! Haven't seen you in ages! How long's it been?
conversations.reply_chinese: 史蒂夫!好长时间不见了,有多久了呢?

title: 你办的聚会总是很有意思

conversations.english: Hi, come in! May I take your coat?
conversations.chinese: 请进,要把衣服脱了吗?
conversations.reply_english: Thank you! I brought a bottle of wine. I hope you like it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 谢谢你,我带了一瓶葡萄酒,希望你能喜欢.

title: 我自己独有这间房间吗

conversations.english: Cindy, I have this room to myself?
conversations.chinese: 辛迪，我自己独有这间房间吗？
conversations.reply_english: It's all yours.
conversations.reply_chinese: 它完全是你一个人的。

conversations.english: Which one is your house?
conversations.chinese: 哪一栋是你们家？
conversations.reply_english: It's the one with the brown truck parked on the driveway.
conversations.reply_chinese: 车道上停着咖啡色货车的那栋。

title: 很高兴终于和你们大家见面了

conversations.english: Hi, Mary!
conversations.chinese: 嗨，玛丽！
conversations.reply_english: Hello, everyone!
conversations.reply_chinese: 哈啰，大家好！

conversations.english: I often recalled the days when Tom and I were madly in love.
conversations.chinese: 我经常回忆起我和Tom热恋的日子。
conversations.reply_english: Very romantic?
conversations.reply_chinese: 非常浪漫吗？

conversations.english: I cannot understand why she always helps and supports her brother.
conversations.chinese: 我真不明白她为何总是帮着她的弟弟说话，支持着她弟弟。
conversations.reply_english: Why do you say so?
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么这么说？

conversations.english: Hi, Michael, how's it going?
conversations.chinese: 喂,迈克,怎么样?
conversations.reply_english: Well, things are all right.
conversations.reply_chinese: 还凑活吧?

conversations.english: I've heard you're going to America tomorrow. I want to see you off at the airport.
conversations.chinese: 我听说你明天要去美国。我想到机场为你送行。
conversations.reply_english: Oh, thanks a lot.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，非常感谢。

title: 你来送行真是太客气了

conversations.english: It's very kind of you to come and see us off.
conversations.chinese: 你来给我们送行真是太客气了。
conversations.reply_english: My pleasure．What a pity you have to leave so soon!
conversations.reply_chinese: 应该的．真遗憾，你们这么快就要走了。

conversations.english: Every time when heroes came back from the battlefield, we took our hats off to them.
conversations.chinese: 每次当英雄们从战场回来的时候，我们都要脱帽向他们致敬。
conversations.reply_english: You were showing respect and admiration for them.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是你们显示出对他们的敬慕。

title: 那个警察对司机大喊大叫

conversations.english: What a police officer!
conversations.chinese: 什么警察啊！
conversations.reply_english: I’ve never seem such a scene either except in films.
conversations.reply_chinese: 除了在电影里，我从来没看过这种情景。

title: 真不敢相信我们要离开了

conversations.english: Well,everthing is packed and ready to go.
conversations.chinese: 嗯，东西都收拾好了，随时可以出发．
conversations.reply_english: It's hard to beIieve that we're really leaving. The past two weeks was like a dream.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真不敢相信我们真的要离开了,过去的两周像梦境一般美妙．

conversations.english: Guess who I saw just now?
conversations.chinese: 猜猜我看到了谁？
conversations.reply_english: Who?
conversations.reply_chinese: 谁呀？

conversations.english: Do you like traveling, Kathy?
conversations.chinese: 你喜欢旅游吗，凯西？
conversations.reply_english: I like traveling for pleasure to get places for vacation for instance. But I don’t like traveling to work, waiting for buses, or…
conversations.reply_chinese: 我喜欢去一些地方旅游度假，例如。但是我们不喜欢出差去工作，等巴士，或者…

conversations.english: What? You golden watch is lost?
conversations.chinese: 什么？你的金表丢了？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. I just can't find it anywhere.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是呀，我刚才都找遍了也没找到。

conversations.english: Can you speak English?
conversations.chinese: 你能说英语吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes I can. I speak it very well.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的我会。我说得很好

conversations.english: I understand your feeling. When someone is feeling at loose ends, we may show mercy on him. This is what we call the "milk of human kindness".
conversations.chinese: 我能理解你的感受。当一个人心理没有着落的时候，我们就会对他怜悯有加。这就是我们通常说的“人之初，性本善。”
conversations.reply_english: That's right. But feeling sorry for someone is one thing, and sticking to our principles is another. We must make a clear cut between them.
conversations.reply_chinese: 说对了。但是同情人是一回事，坚持原则又是另一回是。我们必需明确区分二者。

conversations.english: Now you two have a safe drive back. I can't tell you how much I enjoyed your staying with us. You're perfect boarders.
conversations.chinese: 现在你们两个平安开车回到这里。真无法形容我有多喜欢你们住在这里的那段时间。你们真是完美的房客。
conversations.reply_english: And you're the perfect hostess, Mrs Van Helsing. Thanks for everything you did for us. You really made us feel right at home.
conversations.reply_chinese: 而你也是完美的女主人，凡赫尔辛太太。谢谢你为我们所做的一切。你真的令我们宾至如归。

conversations.english: As the Chinese say, "All feasts must come to an end."
conversations.chinese: 就如中国人说的：“天下无不散的宴席。”
conversations.reply_english: Where did you hear that saying?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你在哪里听到这句谚语的？

conversations.english: Hi, Mr. James, what's the rush?
conversations.chinese: 嘿，詹姆斯先生，你怎么那么匆忙？
conversations.reply_english: The bank closes in 30 minutes and I need to cash a check.
conversations.reply_chinese: 银行还有30分钟就要关门了，我需要兑换支票。

conversations.english: I don’t know how to deal with Jack. He is indeed a trouble maker. He has louse up my business several times.
conversations.chinese: 我不知道怎么对付杰克，他实在是个捣蛋鬼，好几次把我的事情弄成一团糟。
conversations.reply_english: You mean Lily’s boyfriend?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你是说莉莉的男友？

conversations.english: What would you reckon the taxing increases?
conversations.chinese: 你对增税有什么看法？
conversations.reply_english: Well, the state will benefit a lot, I suppose.
conversations.reply_chinese: 额，我想政府会获益良多。

conversations.english: You honestly believe the world’s improving every day?
conversations.chinese: 你真的认为世界每天都在进步吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I do. I think that science is making us wiser. What do you think?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我认为是。我觉得科学使我们变得更加聪明。你有什么看法呢？

title: 他个私家侦探He's a private eye.

conversations.english: What's his job?
conversations.chinese: 他是做什么的？
conversations.reply_english: He used to be a policeman.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他过去是当警察的。

title: 他有三寸不烂之舌A glib tongue

conversations.english: What do you think of the lawyer's speech?
conversations.chinese: 你觉得那个律师的演说如何？
conversations.reply_english: He has a glib tongue. Few people can argue him down.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他有三寸不烂之舌，几乎没人能驳倒他。

title: 他可真够幸运的He is really lucky

conversations.english: I heard Tom was caught stealing something again in the supermarket.
conversations.chinese: 我听说汤姆在超市偷东西的时候又被抓住了。
conversations.reply_english: Really? He deserves it! They should teach him a good lesson.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是吗？他活该！他们应该好好教训他一顿。

title: 我为她痴狂 I’m crazy about her

conversations.english: Mary has really gotten under my skin.
conversations.chinese: Mary 真让我心烦意乱。
conversations.reply_english: I know what love it. When I was young, I felt the same way.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我知道爱情是什么，我年轻时，也有这种感觉。

conversations.english: I heard you are busy with your new house now?
conversations.chinese: 听说最近你在忙房子的事情？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I want my own house very much, so I decide to buy one.
conversations.reply_chinese: 对，我很想拥有自己的房子，所以想买一所。

conversations.english: I learned of the railway accident only this morning.
conversations.chinese: 我今天早上才听说火车事故的事情。
conversations.reply_english: A really dreadful accident and many people were killed.
conversations.reply_chinese: 真是一场可怕的事故，死了很多人。

conversations.english: What happened to your brother?
conversations.chinese: 你哥哥出什么事情了？
conversations.reply_english: It seems that he has gone ape over the girl.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他像是迷上那个姑娘了。

title: 昨晚我惹我父亲生气了

conversations.english: It seems that something is praying heavy on you.What’s the matter?
conversations.chinese: 你看上去心事重重，怎么回事？
conversations.reply_english: I got my father’s goat last night.
conversations.reply_chinese: 昨晚我惹我父亲生气了。

title: 我想要个漂亮整洁的厨房

conversations.english: I want to give our kitchen the works.
conversations.chinese: 我想把我们的厨房完全装修一遍。
conversations.reply_english: Why? I think it’s convenient and good.
conversations.reply_chinese: 为什么？我觉得它很方便很好呀。

conversations.english: Okay, can I ask you something direct?
conversations.chinese: 我能问你些事儿吗？
conversations.reply_english: Ha! It's not like you've ever been one to beat around the bush.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哈！这可不像你，你说话从来都不拐弯抹角的。

conversations.english: The government has to face a lot of social problems now.
conversations.chinese: 现在政府面临许多社会问题。
conversations.reply_english: I think it is unemployment that gives rise to such social problems.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是失业导致了这些社会问题。

conversations.english: Henry, don’t get out of doing housework.
conversations.chinese: Henry，别尽想着逃避责任。
conversations.reply_english: It’s none of my business.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那不关我的事。

conversations.english: The woman was beaten again. Why didn’t she call the police.
conversations.chinese: 那个女人又挨打了，她为什么不报警呢？
conversations.reply_english: Because it was her husband who beat her.
conversations.reply_chinese: 因为是她的丈夫打的她。

title: 你看起来很沮丧 You seem depressed

conversations.english: You seem depressed these days. What's the matter?
conversations.chinese: 你看起来非常沮丧，发生什么事情了？
conversations.reply_english: I went bankrupt and I'm flat broke tnow.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我破产了，现在身无分文。

conversations.english: Where is Tom?
conversations.chinese: Tom去哪儿呢？
conversations.reply_english: He is in the bedroom and fallen asleep.
conversations.reply_chinese: 他在卧室睡着了。

conversations.english: It is difficult for old people to do away with old ideas.
conversations.chinese: 要老人们根除他们的观念是很难的。
conversations.reply_english: So the reform cannot be carried out well.
conversations.reply_chinese: 所以改革进行得不顺利。

conversations.english: Does Tom drink a lot?
conversations.chinese: 汤姆喝酒喝得很多吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, he does. He often has had one to many. But I advised him not to drink too much, he just boasted that he had hollow legs and nobody had ever drunk him under the table.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，他经常喝很多，但是当我建议他别喝多是，他总是吹牛，说他的酒量打得不得了，没人能把他灌倒。

conversations.english: I think that’s settled.
conversations.chinese: 我想就这么决定了。
conversations.reply_english: I'm tired of your cut-and-dried opinions. Who do you think you are!
conversations.reply_chinese: 我烦死了你那些陈词滥调，你以为你是谁呀？

title: 他是个讲道理的好人A sensible kind man

conversations.english: Have you ever thought about Tom’s attitude?
conversations.chinese: 你曾想过汤姆的态度没有？
conversations.reply_english: I’ve cut it up and come to the conclusion that hi is actually sick of Jenny’s brother. But he likes Jenny. She is a big apple in his eye.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我仔细分析过，我认为他的确讨厌Jenny的哥哥，但是他喜欢Jenny，在他眼里Jenny就是掌上明珠。

title: 你脸色很苍白You look pale

conversations.english: You look pale, you must have poor health.
conversations.chinese: 你脸色很苍白，身体一定不大好。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. You said it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，你说对了。

conversations.english: Where is John? I can't find him anywhere.
conversations.chinese: 约翰在哪里？我怎么哪儿都找不到他。
conversations.reply_english: Haven't you heard that he is in prison?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你还没听说他进监狱了吗？

title: 他出售毒品给人当场抓住

conversations.english: A friend of mine is now in the big house. He was caught red-handed for selling cocaine.
conversations.chinese: 我的一个朋友现在在监狱里，他出售可卡因给人当场抓住。
conversations.reply_english: That is a deadly risky business. He should have it coming on him.
conversations.reply_chinese: 这买卖可是风险很大的。他是罪有因得。

conversations.english: Henry married Rose only after her father's money, didn't he?
conversations.chinese: Henry只是看上Rose父亲的钱才娶了她，是吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. But he soon feel regretted for it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。但是他很快就后悔了。

title: 苏珊得了癌症Got the cancer

conversations.english: Susan has got the cancer of stomach.
conversations.chinese: 苏珊得了胃癌。
conversations.reply_english: How terrible! This is quite unexpected!
conversations.reply_chinese: 太可怕了！这真让人难以置信！

conversations.english: It seldom rains this summer.
conversations.chinese: 今年夏天下雨很少。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, some places are very short of water.
conversations.reply_chinese: 就是，有些地方十分缺水。

title: 我经常感觉到自己孤独无助

conversations.english: I always feel I’m left high and dry with nobody to rely on.
conversations.chinese: 我经常感觉到自己孤独无助，没有人可以信赖。
conversations.reply_english: Don’t be fool. I’ll always side with you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 别傻了，我会永远支持你。

title: 你明天想去听音乐会吗

conversations.english: Can’t you remember the days when you had the hots for me?
conversations.chinese: 你还记得你迷恋上我的日子吗？
conversations.reply_english: You tried to seduce me. I fell for you.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你诱惑我，我才迷恋上你的。

conversations.english: Susan has got married.
conversations.chinese: 苏珊已经结婚了。
conversations.reply_english: Really? How do you know that?
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？你怎么知道的？

title: 玛丽的婚姻面临破裂了

conversations.english: Do you know that Mary’s marriage is on the rocks?
conversations.chinese: 你知道吗？玛丽的婚姻面临破裂了。
conversations.reply_english: Really? I’ve never heard of it!
conversations.reply_chinese: 真的吗？我从没听说过。

title: 我母亲和妻子的意见总是不统一

conversations.english: My mother and my wife are always holding different ideas.
conversations.chinese: 我母亲和我妻子的意见总是不统一。
conversations.reply_english: If you are really in love with your wife, you should be in support of her. You can’t have it both ways, of course.
conversations.reply_chinese: 如果你要是真爱你的妻子，你应该支持她。你总不能两者兼顾吧。

conversations.english: He is planning again.
conversations.chinese: 他又在计划了。
conversations.reply_english: Yeah. But whatever the planes are, he always has an eye to money.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是啊，但是无论计划什么，他总是以赚钱为目的。

title: 我的弟弟居心叵测 Has an axe to grind

conversations.english: One family skeleton of my family was that my younger brother has an axe to grind.
conversations.chinese: 我们家的一个家丑就是我的弟弟居心叵测。
conversations.reply_english: What did he aim at?
conversations.reply_chinese: 他的目的是什么？

title: 约翰在生活中遇到麻烦了

conversations.english: John has some trouble in his life.
conversations.chinese: 约翰在生活中遇到麻烦了。
conversations.reply_english: I hear that his father died.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我听说他爸爸死了。

title: 他这人无所不知Has a finger in the pie

conversations.english: Where can I get the information, Kate?
conversations.chinese: Kate，我从哪儿可以得到这个信息呢？
conversations.reply_english: Ask John. He is sure to know about it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 问问John吧，他一定知道。

title: 我想知道那是什么意思

conversations.english: He said I have a big nose. I wonder what that means.
conversations.chinese: 他说我是个包打听，我想知道这是什么意思。
conversations.reply_english: You are interested in other people’s business, aren’t you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你对别人的事情很感兴趣，不是吗？

title: 他是个有前科的人A man with a history

conversations.english: He was hauled up last week for the second time.
conversations.chinese: 他上周又被捕了。
conversations.reply_english: You mean he had been put in prison before.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你的意思是说他以前进过监狱。

title: 我要去医院 I’m going to the hospital

conversations.english: Where are you going?
conversations.chinese: 你去哪？
conversations.reply_english: I’m going to the hospital.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我到医院去。

title: 我讨厌穿别人的旧衣服

conversations.english: I hated the hand-me-downs to wear when I was a kid.
conversations.chinese: 我小时候就讨厌穿别人的旧衣服。
conversations.reply_english: That’s understandable. Every kid likes new clothes.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那是可以理解的，每个孩子都喜欢新衣服。

conversations.english: It is time to butter him up.
conversations.chinese: 我该去奉承奉承他了。
conversations.reply_english: What do you have to do to grease the palm of him?
conversations.reply_chinese: 你得做些什么才能贿赂他呢？

conversations.english: Have you met John?
conversations.chinese: 你见到约翰了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, he came back from America last week.
conversations.reply_chinese: 见到了，他上个星期从美国回来。

title: 她是个乐于助人的热心肠的人

conversations.english: Do you think I should ask Bob to help? Will he come?
conversations.chinese: 你认为是够可以让Bob来帮帮忙？他会来吗？
conversations.reply_english: No problem. You know him. He’s the kind of guy that’s always willing to go the extra miles.
conversations.reply_chinese: 没问题，你了解她的为人，她是那种乐于助人的热心肠的人。

title: 现代都市的污染越来越严重

conversations.english: Have you ever noticed that serious pollution in modern cities goes from bad to worse?
conversations.chinese: 你注意到了吗？现代都市的污染越来越严重了。
conversations.reply_english: You said it. We’er breathing poisonous air every day.
conversations.reply_chinese: 你说得对啊。我们每天呼吸的都是有毒的空气。

title: 谁要对这次交通事故负责

conversations.english: Who is responsible for the accident? Is it Tony’s fault?
conversations.chinese: 谁对这次事故负责？是Tony的错吗？
conversations.reply_english: No. I don’t suppose he’s to blame. The man in the other car made a big mistake.
conversations.reply_chinese: 不，我认为这不能怪他，另外那辆车的司机犯了大错误。

conversations.english: Do you mind if we call on you this evening?
conversations.chinese: 今晚我们去拜访您，您介意吗？
conversations.reply_english: Of course not,we'd be happy if you could come.What time will you be able to come?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然不，您能来我们会非常高兴的。什么时间到呢？

conversations.english: I'm going to have some people over for dinner Saturday night.Would you like to join us?
conversations.chinese: 我星期六晚上打算请几个人过来吃饭，您愿意来吗？
conversations.reply_english: Oh,I'm afraid I'll be busy tomorrow evening.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦，恐怕我明天会很忙。

conversations.english: Mr.Keller,may I call at your home sometime the week?
conversations.chinese: 凯勒先生,我这个星期什么时候去拜访你家行吗?
conversations.reply_english: Oh,certainly.When would you like to come?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然行。你想什么时候来？

conversations.english: Jodge, You must come around sometime, You have to check out my mew stereo.
conversations.chinese: Jodge,你一定要找时间过来，你一定要来看看我新买的音响。
conversations.reply_english: Sure, When is good time for you?
conversations.reply_chinese: 当然，你什么时候方便？

title: 我今晚不能拜访你们了

conversations.english: I'm calling about our appointment.I can't call on you this evening.My wife is terribly ill.
conversations.chinese: 我打电话谈谈我们约会的事。我妻子病得很厉害,今晚就不能拜访你们了.
conversations.reply_english: Sorry to hear that.
conversations.reply_chinese: 噢，是这样。

conversations.english: It seems so strange to be here, burying you, but it's not you.
conversations.chinese: 待在这里挺怪的，埋葬你，却又不是你。
conversations.reply_english: Ashes to ashes and dust to dust...
conversations.reply_chinese: 尘归尘、土归土……
